title: Murder of the Future
description: Set in the future where mankind has been forced to find a new home in outer space. Kathi is a Fae investigator with a kick ass team sent to solve a murder at a museum of ancient artefacts. When they arrive on the scene the body disappears leaving Kathi and her team to solve a murder with little to go on.A 10,000 word eBook with a real scooby do feel, well if scooby doo were armed with high power explosives and futuristic weapons that is!
author: Kathi S. Barton
